Zeth,"},{"lineNumber":224496,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の次女にあたる人物です」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the second daughter of the Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":224497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは早速、評価を見てみましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then, let's quickly look at her points."},{"lineNumber":224499,"originalJapaneseLine":"友好は仲良くなる難度、捕捉は捕まえやすさ、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Friendship' is the difficulty of becoming friendly, 'Capture' is how easy it is to catch,"},{"lineNumber":224500,"originalJapaneseLine":"命令はあなたの言うことを聞いてくれるかです」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Command' is whether she will obey your orders.\""},{"lineNumber":224501,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス王国の姫、","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess of the Kingdom of Zeth,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅を続けて二週間――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having continued the journey for two weeks—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはいくつもの冒険を経て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have gone through many adventures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに足を踏み入れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and stepped into the land of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおー……マジぱねー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa... seriously insane..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達はまた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all once again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランの通り過ぎた跡地に行き当たった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came upon the site where Kuelplan had passed through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここもクエルプランが通ったのかあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kuelplan passed through here too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱデカイなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really huge..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、こないだはこれと戦ったんだよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, we fought this the other day, didn't we.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出しただけでブルってきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just remembering it gives me the chills..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義、そろそろ今日の行程は終了よね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rangi, today's journey is almost over, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　そうだね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Yeah, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予定より早く来ることが出来たし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrived earlier than planned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は長めに休もうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let's rest a bit longer today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、この辺りにキャンプ地作りましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, shall we set up camp around here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなところで寝る気！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You want to sleep in a place like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　クエルプランの通った後は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? After Kuelplan has passed through here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確率的にクエルプランが来る可能性が低い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the probability of Kuelplan coming again is low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝床には悪くないでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not a bad place to sleep, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、それでもいーか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I guess that's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、この間殺されかけといて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, after almost being killed the other day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくそんなこと言えるな！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how can you say something like that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア！？　殺されかけてねーよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? I wasn't almost killed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞が邪魔しなけりゃ俺が殺してたわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it weren't for <Yell> interfering, I would've killed it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーーー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, eehhh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに通り過ぎた後で食事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After passing through, it was hard to feel hungry enough to eat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食欲がなくなるということで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くにキャンプを作り体を休めることにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you decided to set up camp nearby and rest your bodies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焚き火を囲んで皆で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gathered around the campfire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーとリセットの作った食事に舌鼓を打つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone savored the meal prepared by Rocky and Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、ロッキー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと肉を用意しろよ。肉肉」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bring more meat. Meat, meat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみませんだ、今はちょっと手に入らなくて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, but I can't get any at the moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また街に行って補給した方が良さそうだすな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We should probably go back to town to resupply."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはザンスとロッキーの会話を聞きながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You listened to the conversation between Zans and Rocky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野菜と豆がたっぷり入ったスープを一口飲んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and took a sip of soup filled with plenty of vegetables and beans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう数日でゼスにつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In a few days, we'll reach Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで来たら遠回りせずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we've come this far, let's go straight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま行きたいものだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without taking any detours..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んだァ？　もうそんなとこまで来てたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? We've come that far already?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スシヌかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sushinu, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会うのは久し振りー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been a long time since I last met her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしは初めて会うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's my first time meeting her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どんな人なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of person is she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっと、そういうことなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, if that's the case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつものアレが役に立つ時！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's the perfect time for that usual thing to come in handy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、母ちゃんからの手紙を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Yell>, let's read the letter from your mom."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 読んでみようぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's have a look."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君に促され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encouraged by Nagata-kun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母から送られた手紙を取り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you took out the letter sent by your mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、なになに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, let's see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんにちは、＜エール＞。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hello, <Yell>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅は順調でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is your journey going well?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼス王国の姫、スシヌ・ザ・ガンジーは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Princess Sushinu the Gandhi of the Kingdom of Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の次女にあたる人物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the second daughter of the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは早速、評価を見てみましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, let's quickly look at her evaluation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「評価点は三つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are three evaluation points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友好は仲良くなる難度、捕捉は捕まえやすさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Friendship' is the difficulty of becoming friendly, 'Capture' is how easy it is to catch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命令はあなたの言うことを聞いてくれるかです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Command' is whether she will obey your orders."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス王国の姫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess of the Kingdom of Zeth,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅を続けて二週間――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having continued the journey for two weeks—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはいくつもの冒険を経て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have gone through many adventures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに足を踏み入れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and stepped into the land of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおー……マジぱねー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa... seriously insane..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達はまた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all once again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランの通り過ぎた跡地に行き当たった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came upon the site where Kuelplan had passed through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここもクエルプランが通ったのかあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kuelplan passed through here too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱデカイなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really huge..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、こないだはこれと戦ったんだよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, we fought this the other day, didn't we.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出しただけでブルってきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just remembering it gives me the chills..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義、そろそろ今日の行程は終了よね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rangi, today's journey is almost over, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　そうだね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Yeah, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予定より早く来ることが出来たし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrived earlier than planned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は長めに休もうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let's rest a bit longer today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、この辺りにキャンプ地作りましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, shall we set up camp around here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなところで寝る気！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You want to sleep in a place like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　クエルプランの通った後は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? After Kuelplan has passed through here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確率的にクエルプランが来る可能性が低い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the probability of Kuelplan coming again is low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝床には悪くないでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not a bad place to sleep, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、それでもいーか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I guess that's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、この間殺されかけといて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, after almost being killed the other day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくそんなこと言えるな！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how can you say something like that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア！？　殺されかけてねーよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? I wasn't almost killed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞が邪魔しなけりゃ俺が殺してたわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it weren't for <Yell> interfering, I would've killed it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーーー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, eehhh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに通り過ぎた後で食事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After passing through, it was hard to feel hungry enough to eat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食欲がなくなるということで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くにキャンプを作り体を休めることにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you decided to set up camp nearby and rest your bodies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焚き火を囲んで皆で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gathered around the campfire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーとリセットの作った食事に舌鼓を打つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone savored the meal prepared by Rocky and Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、ロッキー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと肉を用意しろよ。肉肉」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bring more meat. Meat, meat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみませんだ、今はちょっと手に入らなくて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, but I can't get any at the moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また街に行って補給した方が良さそうだすな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We should probably go back to town to resupply."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはザンスとロッキーの会話を聞きながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You listened to the conversation between Zans and Rocky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野菜と豆がたっぷり入ったスープを一口飲んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and took a sip of soup filled with plenty of vegetables and beans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう数日でゼスにつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In a few days, we'll reach Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで来たら遠回りせずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we've come this far, let's go straight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま行きたいものだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without taking any detours..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んだァ？　もうそんなとこまで来てたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? We've come that far already?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スシヌかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sushinu, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会うのは久し振りー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been a long time since I last met her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしは初めて会うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's my first time meeting her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どんな人なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of person is she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっと、そういうことなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, if that's the case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつものアレが役に立つ時！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's the perfect time for that usual thing to come in handy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、母ちゃんからの手紙を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Yell>, let's read the letter from your mom."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 読んでみようぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's have a look."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君に促され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encouraged by Nagata-kun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母から送られた手紙を取り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you took out the letter sent by your mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、なになに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, let's see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんにちは、＜エール＞。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hello, <Yell>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅は順調でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is your journey going well?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼス王国の姫、スシヌ・ザ・ガンジーは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Princess Sushinu the Gandhi of the Kingdom of Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の次女にあたる人物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the second daughter of the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは早速、評価を見てみましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, let's quickly look at her evaluation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「評価点は三つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are three evaluation points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友好は仲良くなる難度、捕捉は捕まえやすさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Friendship' is the difficulty of becoming friendly, 'Capture' is how easy it is to catch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命令はあなたの言うことを聞いてくれるかです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Command' is whether she will obey your orders."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス王国の姫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess of the Kingdom of Zeth,
